forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 62F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
